item.title: Shodan Powershell Modules
item.description: Shodan_PS A collection of PowerShell Modules for Interacting with the Shodan API Notes: You’ll need you Shodan API key, which can be found on your Shodan Account Examples of the APIs used in the modules may be found on the Shodan Developers Page Download and Install Download the modules from the GitHub Repository Install all the modules Get-ChildItem -Recurse *.ps1 | Import-Module
